title: No False Positive: The Global Economy Is Slowing
text:
We are getting additional evidence of a burgeoning industrial recessionThe only questions now are how bad is it and how widespread the slowdown will becomeHere are my thoughts on what to watch for as well as how I'm positionedA recession for manufacturing is already underway Tuesday's ISM Manufacturing report was very poor, and it represents the s...
